charts.name: myChart
charts.csql: SELECT DayName(left(created,10)) AS Day, count(tid) AS noTweets FROM tweets WHERE left(created,10)<=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d')AND left(created,10)>DATE_FORMAT(date_add(curdate(),INTERVAL -7 DAY),'%d-%M-%Y') GROUP By DayName(left(created,10))

charts.name: noTweetsDay
charts.csql: SELECT Count(tid) AS 'noTw' FROM tweets WHERE left(created,10)=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d')

charts.name: twpd
charts.csql: SELECT Count(tid) AS 'noTw' FROM tweets  WHERE left(created,10)=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d')

charts.name: tsts
charts.csql: SELECT DayName(left(created,10)) AS Day, count(tid) AS noTweets FROM tweets WHERE left(created,10)<=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d')AND left(created,10)>DATE_FORMAT(date_add(curdate(),INTERVAL -7 DAY),'%d-%M-%Y') GROUP By DayName(left(created,10))

SELECT DayName(left(created,10)) AS Day, count(tid) AS noTweets FROM tweets WHERE left(created,10)<=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d')AND left(created,10)>DATE_FORMAT(date_add(curdate(),INTERVAL -7 DAY),'%d-%M-%Y') GROUP By DayName(left(created,10))
charts.name: LineTest
BlogNonBlog
charts.csql:
SELECT blog AS 'Type',
COUNT(tid) AS 'no' FROM tweets
GROUP BY blog

charts.name: MSTest4
